titlestmt.titleproper: Commonwealth Fund records, International Program in Health Care Policy (IHP), SG 3, Series 14
A Guide to the Commonwealth Fund records, International Program in Health Care Policy (IHP), SG 3, Series 14 FA1475

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-01-17 00:41:58 -0500.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Fund records, International Program in Health Care Policy, (IHP), SG 3, Series 14

physdesc.extent: 182 letter-size document boxes, 12 legal size document boxes,

archdesc.arrangement:
Arrangement Arranged in ten subseries as follows:
1. IHP Chronological Files
2. IHP Reference
3. Harkness Fellowships Administration
4. IHP Financial Administration
5. President's Discretionary Fund (PDF)
6. Symposiums and Surveys
7. Ian Axford (New Zealand) Fellowships in Public Policy
8. Atlantic Fellowships
9. IHP Program Files
10. Audiovisual Materials

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimal processing, 2018. Some records remain in original file folders.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC has legal title, copyright and literary property rights to this collection in so far as it holds them.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Commonwealth Fund records were donated to RAC in 1985. The initial transfer of archival records to RAC began in 1986, and transfers continue on a regular basis. This series was transferred to RAC as multiple accessions from 2007 through 2009.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series documents the administration of the International Program in Health Care Policy (IHP) including records documenting symposiums, conferences and workshops, program planning, correspondence and reports and chronological files, as well as records of the associated fellowship programs including the Harkness Fellowships, Atlantic Fellowships and Ian Axford (New Zealand) Fellowships. The bulk of the material represented in this series spans the 1990s through the early 2000s.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Other available finding aids describing the Commonwealth Fund IHP and Fellowship records include:
